Olympiads.name: Olympiads
Olympiads.desc: There are olympiads for three categories, i.e Junior, Secondary and Higher Secondary. Students can participate in Math, Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Astronomy Olympiad.

Problem Solving.name: Problem Solving
Problem Solving.desc: Students from any class can participate in this segment

Competitive Programming.name: Competitive Programming
Competitive Programming.desc: This is an online competition. Students from any class can participate in this segment.

Speedcubing.name: Speedcubing
Speedcubing.desc: Students from any class can participate in this segment. The individual who'll solve it in the shortest time, will win.

Sudoku Solving.name: Sudoku Solving
Sudoku Solving.desc: Students from any class can participate in this segment. The individual who'll solve it in the shortest time, will win.

Photography.name: Photography
Photography.desc: Its an online segment. Participants can submit their photograph here.

Science Fiction Writing.name: Science Fiction Writing
Science Fiction Writing.desc: Its an online segment. Participants can submit their fiction story here.

Scrapbook.name: Scrapbook Competition
Scrapbook.desc: Participants can submit their scrapbook in venue.

Project showcase.name: Project Showcase
Project showcase.desc: A team will make their project and show it in the venue.

Wall Magazine.name: Wall Magazine
Wall Magazine.desc: A team will make their magazine and show it in the venue.
